title: The Art Of Electronics (sec. Edn.)
description: This Is The Throughly Revised And Updated Second Edition Of The Hugely Successful The Art Of Electronics. Widely Accepted As The Single Authoritative Text And Reference On Electronic Circuit Design, Both Analog And Digital, The Original Edition Sold Over 125,000 Copies Worldwide And Was Translated Into Eight Languages. The Book Revolutionized The Teaching Of Electronics By Emphasizing The Methods Actually Used By Circuit Designers-A Combination Of Some Basic Laws, Rules To Thumb, And A Large Non-Mathematical Treatment That Encourages Circuit Values And Performance.
